channel.title: Pro Coder
channel.description: Actionable Advice to Accelerate Your Career

item.title: Making rookie mistakes 3
item.description: Ever made a rookie mistake that left you shaking your head? I did--and it cost me three days of debugging! Learn from my misstep and discover how slowing down and testing one step at a time can save you time and frustration!
